column1: Little Goat Diner////Not as sophisticated and trendy as Girl and the Goat
column4: as crazily creative and in a good way. There's something for every palate
column5: especially if the diner ignores the huge amount of butter
column6: oil or grease and sodium is used to make each dish. Everything from sandwiches
column9: to the oh so greasy and delicious fries are wonderful. The only ho hum aspect to the meal are the desserts
